frontMatter.title: calibre web用户如何设置的
frontMatter.summary: 你好，calibre web用户如何设置的？config页面没有用户设定，submit后，无法登录，是默认用户名密码吗？ 第一次会叫你设置的我记得？或者你可以试试docker版 https://docs.linuxserver.io/images/docker-calibre-web

prev.title: Scale By The Bay 2019: Norman Maurer, Netty 5: Lessons Learned
prev.summary: Netty is one of the most used network frameworks on the JVM (if not the most used) which provides its users not only with great flexibility but also with superb performance. While Netty 4.x was a great success and is used literally everywhere in production it became clear over the “years” that a few design choices that where made did produce various limitations. As work has started on Netty 5, it’s time to fix these limitations and incorporate all the feedback we received from the community and core maintainers. This talk will focus on multiple core changes that are scheduled for netty 5 by explaining what “real-world issues” these solve and how these changes will help to operate Netty in high-scale production environments. Also it will give a brief overview of the general planed timeline of Netty 5 and roadmap.

next.title: 用 calibre-web 建立一个私人的在线书库
next.summary: 之前分享过可以用https://github.com/janeczku/calibre-web 建立一个私人的在线书库，因为是web所以可以跨设备运行，进度也可以共享，今天有空用docker跑了一个给大家看看效果。
